oai_dc:dc.dc:title: هذه رسالة الابحاث الملخصة في حكم كي الحمصة / لعبد الغني الشهير بابن النابلسي : مخطوطة، 1813
Hādhihi risālat al-Abḥāth al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm kayy al-ḥimmaṣah / li-ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-shahīr bi-Ibn al-Nābulusī : manuscript, 1813

Abḥāth al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm kayy al-ḥimmaṣah
Rafʻ al-ḍarūrah ʻan ḥajj al-ṣayrūrah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nābulusī, ʻAbd al-Ghanī ibn Ismāʻīl , 1641-1731

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophon (f. 3v), copy completed on 1 Muḥarram 1229 AH [December 24, 1813 AD] in the hand of ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥamad Saʻīd ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥāsinī al-Dimashqī al-Ḥanafī.

With: Risālat al-aḥkām al-mulakhkhaṣah fī ḥukm māʼ al-ḥimmaṣah / li-Mawlā al-Shaykh Ḥasan al-Shurunbulālī (ff. 4v-7v) -- Rafʻ al-ḍarūrah ʻan ḥajj al-ṣayrūrah / li-Sayyidī ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Shahīr bi-al-Nābulusī al-Dimashqī al-Ḥanafī (ff. 10v-13v).
MS Arab 276. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
